LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_TopWarning: Changing these options will require restarting the game to apply.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_BottomWarning: Don't see the options you chose? Restart your game!
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_AddNewHairColorsDesc: In addition to the default gray, adds two new black hair colors and a new reddish-brown, all already found in the vanilla game, to add diversity.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_AddNewSkinColorsDesc: In addition to the default black, adds another shade of black and a lighter gray, already found in the vanilla game, to add diversity.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_DisableGauntBodyDesc: This will stop the Wasters from spawning with the Gaunt Body gene from VRE - Wasters to prevent them from looking like shamblers.
LanguageData.BioSynth_VREWasters_KeepInstabilityDesc: VRE Waster adds a genetic decay mechanism, which this mod removes. With this option, it will instead include the Mild Cell Instability gene already found in the vanilla game. This puts them in-line with VRE's vision, without implying that they breed themselves out of existence (not typically what you want in area-denial).
